document.heading: PUEBLO DE SAN ILDEFONSO COUNCIL RESOLUTION NO. SI-R23-001
Support for the Pueblo de San Ildefonso Natural Resource Department to Apply for One-Time Agricultural Funds for FY 2022
document.preamble: At a duly called meeting of the Council of San Ildefonso Pueblo on the 14th day of March , 2023, the following resolution was adopted:

recital.text: the Pueblo de San Ildefonso has the legal authority to apply for, receive and administer federal funds; and,
the Pueblo, through its Natural Resources Department will apply to the Northern Pueblos
Agency (NPA) for One-Time Agriculture Funds for Fiscal Year 2022; and,
the funds will be for the use of cropland and rangeland improvements, agriculture
developments, noxious weed control, and climate adaption plans; and,
the Scope-of-Work (SOW) is attached to outline how the funds will assist the Pueblo in the identification and monitoring of invasive noxious species.
that the Council hereby supports and authorizes the Natural Resource Department to submit an application for agricultural funding and enter into a P.L. 93-638 Contract with the funds."

procedural-data.text: The foregoing resolution was duly voted upon by the Council on March 14, 2023, at a meeting with a vote of 9 in favor, 0 opposed, 0 abstaining and 1 absent (Governor presiding and not voting) pursuant to the authority vested in the Council by the Agreement of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso.

text.strong: DELIVERY OF THE RESOLUTION TO THE GOVERNOR:

procedural-data.text: Resolution No. SI-R23-001 was presented to the Governor of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso on the 14th day of March, 2023, pursuant to the Governing document of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Agreement"), GOVERNOR, Sec. 4(c), and will become effective after signature by the Governor or veto override by the Council.

annotation.doc: Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council Res. No. SI-R23-001

attachment.heading: SUPPORT FOR THE PUEBLO DE SAN ILDEFONSO NATURAL RESOURCE DEPARTMENT TO APPLY FOR ONE-TIME AGRICULTURAL FUNDS FOR FY 2022

section.heading: Short Title
section.text: This enactment shall be known as the "SUPPORT FOR THE PUEBLO DE SAN ILDEFONSO NATURAL RESOURCE DEPARTMENT TO APPLY FOR ONE-TIME AGRICULTURAL FUNDS FOR FY 2022."

section.heading: Purpose
section.text: The Purpose of this resolution is to support the Pueblo's Natural Resources Department to apply for one-time FY2022 Agriculture Program funds through NPA (Northern Pueblos Agency) to control invasive noxious weeds that are currently impacting rangelands, agricultural lands, and irrigation infrastructure.

para.text: The Pueblo de San Ildefonso has the legal authority to apply for, receive and administer federal funds.
The Pueblo, through its Natural Resources Department will apply to the Northern Pueblos Agency (NPA) for One-Time Agriculture Funds for Fiscal Year 2022.
The funds will be for the use of cropland and rangeland improvements, agriculture developments, noxious weed control, and climate adaption plans.
the Scope-of-Work (SOW) is attached to outline how the funds will assist the Pueblo in the identification and monitoring of invasive noxious species.
The Council hereby authorizes the Governor, or his designee, to take such actions as deemed necessary to carry out the intent of this Resolution.
